--- title: Less Random keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A random state manager which provides some reproducibility without sacrificing potential training speed." description: "A random state manager which provides some reproducibility without sacrificing potential training speed." nb_path: "nbs/utils.lessrandom.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Unlike fast.ai's no_random, less_random does not set torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = False so it's possible to train faster. Training runs on the same GPU, PyTorch, & CUDA setup should be reproducable, but differnet hardware/software setup will probably have less reproducability then using no_random.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

less_random[source]

less_random(seed=42, deterministic=True)

Stores and retrieves state of random number generators. Sets random seed for random, torch, and numpy. Does not set torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = False
